name: Heart Rhythm
description:
The world has lost the sounds - one day people became deaf due to an unknown reason.

A common girl, who recently joined Scavenger Association to have a place to live at, got involved into an adventure she did not really ask for - willing to have an item from the past, she is now being pursued by the whole Scavenger Association.

----------

Heart Rhythm is a Storytelling Adventure inspired by Crypt of the NecroDancer and Undertale. Most of the time the game is played in real-time, but becomes Rhythm-based time to time.

Controls:

  • WASD - Movement
  • I - Inventory

Installation: 

  1.  Download the .zip file;
  2.  Extract the files on your computer;
  3.  Run HeartRhythm executable.

We would be glad to hear your opinion, so please, share your feedback. Also, please, report any bugs you encounter!

Developed by Antonins Vorona aka bubucha.

Art by Viktorija Kudane.
